title: oneHotEncoding
desc: convert categorical vector into a set of vectors for each category with a 0/1

input.description: 2D table to be converted to map

params.description: the columns to which one Hot Encodding should be applied
list of keys for map that correspond to 0 to n columns in table
The rest of the data in the map/matrix is kept but column used is removed unless keepOrig is true
